address: 123 Medical Center Dr, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

faqs.question: What are your operating hours?
faqs.answer: We are open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, and Saturday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. We are closed on Sundays.

faqs.question: Do you accept insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept most major insurance plans including Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, and UnitedHealthcare. Please bring your insurance card to your appointment.

faqs.question: What should I bring to my appointment?
faqs.answer: Please bring a valid ID, your insurance card (if applicable), a list of current medications, and any relevant medical records or test results from other providers.

faqs.question: How do I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
faqs.answer: You can cancel or reschedule your appointment by calling us at +91 9897761393 or by using our online portal. We require at least 24 hours notice for cancellations.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have free parking available in our parking lot. There is also street parking nearby if the lot is full.

faqs.question: Do you offer telemedicine appointments?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer telemedicine appointments for follow-up visits and certain types of consultations. Please specify when booking if you prefer a virtual appointment.

faqs.question: What types of services do you provide?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive primary care services including annual check-ups, preventive care, chronic disease management, acute illness treatment, vaccinations, and health screenings.

faqs.question: How long is a typical appointment?
faqs.answer: A typical appointment lasts 30 minutes for routine visits and 60 minutes for initial consultations or complex issues. Please arrive 15 minutes early for check-in.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: We require at least 24 hours notice for appointment cancellations. Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the appointment may be subject to a cancellation fee.

faqs.question: Can I get prescription refills without an appointment?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can request prescription refills through our patient portal or by calling our office. We typically process refill requests within 24-48 hours during business days.

faqs.question: Do you provide lab services on-site?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have an on-site laboratory for blood tests, urinalysis, and other common lab work. Most results are available within 24-48 hours.

faqs.question: What should I do if I have a medical emergency?
faqs.answer: If you have a medical emergency, please call 911 immediately or go to the nearest emergency room. Do not use this appointment system for urgent medical issues.
